source.dd5ec753:
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
source.86d953ae:
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10,7))
sns.countplot(data=df,x='Stream', order = df['Stream'].value_counts().index,palette='rocket')
plt.xticks(rotation=70)
plt.show()
source.c6c22172:
plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
classx = ['Placed','Not placed']
plt.title('Placed percentage')
colors = sns.color_palette("hls", 8)[6:8]
countx = [len(df[df.PlacedOrNot == 1]),len(df[df.PlacedOrNot == 0])]
plt.pie(countx, labels = classx,colors=colors,autopct='%1.2f%%')
plt.show()

sns.countplot(df['Age'],palette='rocket_r')
plt.title('Age Distribution')
plt.show()
source.a96deace:
plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
classx = ['Male','Female']
plt.title('Gender percentage')
colors = sns.color_palette("hls", 8)[6:8]
countx = [len(df[df.Gender == 'Male']),len(df[df.Gender == 'Female'])]
plt.pie(countx, labels = classx,colors=colors,autopct='%1.2f%%')
plt.show()
source.bf828839:
plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
classx = ['0','1','2','3']
plt.title('INTERNSHIPS')
colors = sns.color_palette("hls", 8)[4:8]
countx = [len(df[df.Internships == 0]),len(df[df.Internships == 1]),len(df[df.Internships==2]),len(df[df.Internships==3])]
plt.pie(countx, labels = classx,colors=colors,autopct='%1.2f%%')
plt.show()

source.a6428ba8:
plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
classx = ['Placed','Not placed']
plt.title('Placements < 2 internships')
colors = sns.color_palette("hls", 8)[4:8]
df2 = df[df.Internships < 2]
countx = [len(df2[df2.PlacedOrNot == 1]),len(df2[df2.PlacedOrNot == 0])]
plt.pie(countx, labels = classx,colors=colors,autopct='%1.2f%%')
plt.show()
source.ee04e44f:
plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
classx = ['Placed','Not placed']
plt.title('Placements > 2 internships')
colors = sns.color_palette("hls", 8)[6:8]
df2 = df[df.Internships >= 2]
countx = [len(df2[df2.PlacedOrNot == 1]),len(df2[df2.PlacedOrNot == 0])]
plt.pie(countx, labels = classx,colors=colors,autopct='%1.2f%%')
plt.show()
source.c759c210:
dfx = df[df.Gender == 'Female']
for i in df.Stream.unique():
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
    classx = ['Placed','Not placed']
    plt.title(i)
    dfxx = dfx[dfx.Stream == i]
    countx = [len(dfxx[dfxx.PlacedOrNot == 1]),len(dfxx[dfxx.PlacedOrNot == 0])]
    plt.pie(countx, labels = classx,colors=colors,autopct='%1.2f%%')
    plt.show()
source.cf9018a7:
dfx = df[df.Gender == 'Male']
for i in df.Stream.unique():
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
    classx = ['Placed','Not placed']
    plt.title(i)
    dfxx = dfx[dfx.Stream == i]
    countx = [len(dfxx[dfxx.PlacedOrNot == 1]),len(dfxx[dfxx.PlacedOrNot == 0])]
    plt.pie(countx, labels = classx,colors=colors,autopct='%1.2f%%')
    plt.show()
source.517f099d: * Most people sitting for placement are from cse branch
source.1f6511c8: * 100% of the people with cgpa greater than 7 got placed
source.d97231b4: * around 45 percent people have not done any internship
source.1b942472: * 80% of people doing more than one internship got placed
source.d12752f4: * only 27 percent people live on campus
source.2de40c93: * Most people applying for placements were 21 and 22 year olds
source.55d30dd3: * Hostel should not have any affect on placement
source.b8ba4cc4: * 20 percent of people sitting for placements have backlog
source.dc4be620:
* Most people were place from cse and it
* over 50% people from Mechanical and Civil engg were not placed
